message: Congratulations on considering my product! With over 10% of my products sold being high-quality, I'm confident that this one is a great opportunity. I'm offering it to you for $100, a fair price considering the rarity of high-quality products. Don't miss out on this chance to own a premium item!
Thank you for the confidence boost and the fair offer. I appreciate the opportunity to potentially own a high-quality product at a reasonable price. Let's proceed with the purchase!

Welcome! I'm glad you're interested in my product. I want to be transparent with you - my sales record shows that about 1/3 of my products are high-quality, and the rest are... well, not so much. With that in mind, I'm still offering this product to you for $100. It's a great value, considering the price of similar products on the market. But I want to make sure you're aware of the potential risk. What do you think?
Thank you for the information. Based on your sales record and the transparency you've shown, I am willing to take the risk and purchase the product for $100.
